alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:40AM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following county, Lincoln. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Meadow Valley Wash and low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1039 AM PDT, Emergency management reported flooding along the Meadow Valley Wash near Ursine. Flooding is already occurring. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Meadow Valley Wash below Eagle Valley Dam - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ursine and low-lying areas along the Meadow Valley Wash to Panaca, Caliente and Elgin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
